definitions: a substance or device that makes something fresher or cleaner

examples.text: parsley is a natural breath freshener
chemicals that smell like toilet freshener

shortDefinitions: substance or device that makes something fresher or cleaner

definitions: a quantity of a drink that refills a partly full glass or cup

examples.text: yes, thank you, I will take a freshener

shortDefinitions: quantity of drink that refills partly full glass or cup
